categories: Category:Cut content from The Heart of the Jedi

nodes.text: Taj Valladian was a male Human who, in his youth, belonged to the leading class of the Galactic Republic and was a good friend of the Alderaanian people. Eventually, he became a member of the Galactic Empire's Senate, until Emperor Palpatine disbanded the assembly. After the Emperor died in the Battle of Endor, Valladian and other former senators representing nearly twelve thousand star systems reformed the Senate to assume leadership of the Empire and negotiate with the Rebellion.
